name: Jackson_Hole
text:
Jackson Hole
"-Says his binoculars killed somebody.-That's my brother, Jerry Horne."
 ―Sergeant Williams and Benjamin Horne
Jackson Hole was a settlement in Wyoming where Jerry Horne was found naked by Jackson Hole Police Sergeant Williams.
Behind the scenes
Jackson Hole is a valley between the Teton Mountain Range and the Gros Ventre Range in Wyoming sitting near the border of Idaho.
